day_01.title: RISHIKESH TO KARCHI VIA JOSHIMATH
day_01.description: Welcome to Joshimath, an important pilgrimage destination in Uttarakhand. Check into your homestay at Karchi and spend the day exploring the village at your own pace.

day_02.title: KARCHI TO GULLING TOP VIA TUGASI
day_02.description: Start your trek from Karchi, passing through Tugasi village with views of the Dhauladhar Range. Camp overnight at Gulling Top.

day_03.title: GULLING TOP TO KHULLARA TOP
day_03.description: Continue through oak, rhododendron, and walnut forests, enjoying views of the Pir Panjal and Shivalik Ranges. Overnight stay at Khullara Top.

day_04.title: TREK FROM KHULLARA TOP TO KUARI PASS AND DESCEND
day_04.description: Trek to Kuari Pass with views of Nanda Devi, Kamet, and Trishul. Return to Khullara Top for an overnight stay.

day_05.title: DOWNHILL TREK FROM KHULLARA TOP TO KARCHI
day_05.description: Descend towards Karchi Village, through Alpine and Mossy Oak forests. Overnight stay at a homestay in Karchi.

day_06.title: TREK DOWN TO KARCHI FROM KHULLARA TOP
day_06.description: End the trek with a downhill journey to Karchi Village.

inclusions: 3 Nights of tented accommodation on twin sharing and 2 nights in a guest house at Karchi on multi sharing.
Vegetarian meals during the trek from Dinner on Day 1 to tea and coffee on Day 6.
Transport (optional): Rishikesh to Karchi and return for an additional 1600 INR.
Trek equipment: Sleeping bag, tents, kitchen tent, dining tent, toilet tent.
Amenities: All utensils, sleeping mattresses, crampons, gaiters for snow.
Health & Safety: First aid kit, oxygen cylinders, stretchers, oxi-meters, BP machines.
Permits: Forest permits and camping permission fee.
Trek crew: High-altitude chef, helpers, trek leader, guides, and support team.
Porters and mules for trekking equipment, ration, and supplies.
exclusions: Personal medical expenses and personal services (e.g., laundry, phone calls, liquor, mineral water).
Offload charges for private baggage: 400 INR per day if paid online, or 2200 INR at base camp (maximum bag weight: 10kg).
Any additional services not mentioned in inclusions.
